problem_names:
theorem comb_planar_compat:
  assumes "comb_planar G"
  shows "kuratowski_planar G"
translations:
theorem comb_planar_compat:
  assumes "comb_planar G"
  shows "kuratowski_planar G"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> kuratowski_planar G \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> kuratowski_planar G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> kuratowski_planar G \<Longrightarrow> False

obtain G0 rev_G0 K rev_K where sub: "subgraph G0 G" "subdivision (K, rev_K) (G0, rev_G0)"
      and is_kur: "K\<^bsub>3,3\<^esub> K \<or> K\<^bsub>5\<^esub> K"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> kuratowski_planar G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>G0 K rev_K rev_G0.
        \<lbrakk>subgraph G0 G; subdivision (K, rev_K) (G0, rev_G0);
         K\<^bsub>3,3\<^esub> K \<or> K\<^bsub>5\<^esub> K\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> (\<nexists>H.
             subgraph H G \<and>
             (\<exists>K rev_K rev_H.
                 subdivision (K, rev_K) (H, rev_H) \<and>
                 (K\<^bsub>3,3\<^esub> K \<or> K\<^bsub>5\<^esub> K)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>G0 K rev_K rev_G0.
        \<lbrakk>subgraph G0 G; subdivision (K, rev_K) (G0, rev_G0);
         K\<^bsub>3,3\<^esub> K \<or> K\<^bsub>5\<^esub> K\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  subgraph G0 G
  subdivision (K, rev_K) (G0, rev_G0)
  K\<^bsub>3,3\<^esub> K \<or> K\<^bsub>5\<^esub> K

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> kuratowski_planar G \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
using this:
  subgraph G0 G
  subdivision (K, rev_K) (G0, rev_G0)
  comb_planar G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. comb_planar K

proof (state)
this:
  comb_planar K

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> kuratowski_planar G \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  comb_planar K

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> kuratowski_planar G \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
using this:
  K\<^bsub>3,3\<^esub> K \<or> K\<^bsub>5\<^esub> K

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> comb_planar K

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> comb_planar K

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> kuratowski_planar G \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (chain)
picking this:
  comb_planar K
  \<not> comb_planar K

proof (prove)
using this:
  comb_planar K
  \<not> comb_planar K

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!
